text: Taylor Swift had her largest concert in Melbourne with 96,000 people and there was no parking provided. Next time someone tells you that "parking is needed" anywhere.

This parking lot in Jersey City, a block away from a light rail station and a 10-minute transit ride to Manhattan, paid $110,000 in taxes per acre last year. The residential tower behind it? $2,689,000 per acre. Surface parking is highly subsidized in this country.

If municipalities hate apartments so much, they should legalize cottage courts. Using 1-2 single family lots for 5 smaller bungalows that surround a court yard would greatly increase housing supply overnight.

With a combined metropolitan population nearly identical, Phoenix and Tucson have no direct rail connection, while Rome and Florence see 66 trains per day in either direction, despite being 46 miles farther apart. We don't need perfection, but we deserve better.

Canada’s two largest metros, Toronto and Montreal, see six trains per day in each direction that take a little more than five hours. Madrid and Barcelona are the same distance and see 35 trains per day each way, taking as little as 2 hours and 30 minutes. Canada deserves better.

In 2019, there were 18,142 flights and 2,836,474 passengers that flew between Atlanta and Orlando (400 miles). If a French TGV train connected both cities, it would take about 3 hours. If the train ran hourly, it would have the capacity to move 8.5 million ppl a year (300% more).

There were 38 million trips between the Los Angeles and Phoenix metro areas in 2010, with the car-to-air travel ratio being nearly 50/50. If a direct rail route along the I-10 corridor operated at 150 mph, it would be 3.5 hours quicker than driving and competitive with flying.

A former steel mill next to a FrontRunner train station in Utah is set to become one of the best TODs I've ever seen. It will bring offices, schools, a performing arts center, 47 acres of parks, and 17,000 residents to a pedestrian-first neighborhood 9x denser than Salt Lake City!

Austin and San Antonio are roughly the same distance apart as Cologne and Frankfurt, Germany. The latter cities see nearly 50 daily round-trip trains and has a travel time of 63 minutes. The former sees a daily round-trip train that takes 143 minutes. We can do far better.
Even outside of this route, this ROW could also entice Bay Area and Sac rail service, which is a huge air market for LV

Today, there will be 14 flights each way to serve Reno and Las Vegas, with 450,000 people each year traveling this route. If you connected both metros with rail via Carson City, you could connect 90% of the state's population with rail in 3 hours.
